module.description_full: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards, 20+ local payment methods and support for over 80 banksTake advantage of the Skrill multi-currency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most trusted and familiar brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Activate easilyWith PayPal, you can start accepting payments quickly without any set-up fee. Include Pay Later options at no extra cost to your businessPay Later lets customers pay over time while you get paid upfront. [1] PayPal's pay later options are helping boost merchant conversion rates and cart sizes by 39% [2] Promote Pay Later on your siteLet customers know they have the flexibility to buy now and pay later by adding Pay Later promotional messaging and Pay Later button to your site. Offer fast checkout with less frictionStreamlined checkout helps reduce cart abandonment, drive conversion rates, and encourage repeat business. With PayPal, customers can use their saved billing and shipping info to check out faster — on any device. Get best-in-class fraud detectionPayPal helps you handle the risk of fraudulent transactions with our fraud, chargeback, and Seller Protection [3] capabilities (on eligible transactions). Our AI technology works hard to monitor your transactions – so you can focus on what matters most. Access funds quickly. After a customer completes their PayPal transaction, you’re quickly credited while the payment is processing. Funds settle directly into your PayPal business account. PayPal is one of the world’s most trusted, and familiar brands [4]Millions of global users20+ years of experience200+ markets around the world100+ different currencies  [1] PayPal Pay Later eligibility and availability is subject to merchant status, sector and integration. Consumer eligibility is subject to status and approval. Product features differ by market. See relevant product terms for more details.https://www.paypal.com/uk/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/terms[2] PayPal Q2 earnings 2021.[3] Available on eligible purchases. Limits apply. https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full[4] Morning Consult - The 15 Most Trusted Brands Globally. March 2021.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: The all-in-one tool : synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial

module.name: payplug
module.displayName: - Payplug - Accept customer payments, wherever they are
module.description: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations.
module.additional_description: One payment system for all your sales channels Payplug allows credit card payments:via your online store (PrestaShop) in just a few clicks;in-store, with payment terminals that meet the highest market standards;through payment links from customer conversations via text, e-mail, messenger, or WhatsApp.Then you can manage all payments from one tool, your Payplug portal. Manage your performance directly from the Payplug portalView all payments in real time;Understand why credit card payments failed;Download integrated accounting reports in one simple click;Generate payment links to be shared via online customer conversations;Carry out bank transfer requests and receive them within 24 hours! Establish your own PrestaShop module to receive online paymentsInstall the Payplug payment module in just a few clicks. Choose the display type for your payment page (redirected, pop-up), and customize the background of your payment page (including colors). Our online payment module is fully secure and compatible with PSD2 - no extra handling is required from you. Handle Payplug directly from your PrestaShop backoffice: for example, you can organize customer refunds. Increase your turnover with PayLaterOffer your customers the option to pay in 3 or 4 installments with or without fees and receive full payment for the order immediately. Fraud and non-payment are 100% covered by our partner Oney.Merchants offering this Payplug feature to their customers have seen their average shopping cart value increase by 45% on average.New: with Payplug, choose the minimum and maximum shopping cart amounts between which the 3x or 4x payment option is made available to your customers. One more step towards optimising your margin! French-speaking supportOnce your payment module is set up, contact our Paris-based support teams with your questions about your online PrestaShop payments.

module.additional_description: This module helps to screen your order transaction for online frauds. The sophisticated and advanced engines help you to thoroughly scan through all elements, such as geolocation, proxy, email, blacklisted, BIN, velocity, and many more to accurately identify potential fraud order. This module came with one month Mini Plan license, that allowing you 1500 queries/month. After the purchase, please contact FraudLabs Pro to unlock the license.

module.name: paybox
module.description: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole. You can easily install the solution on your PrestaShop online store to offer your customers a personalized shopping experience
module.additional_description: For several years, Crédit Agricole has been supporting thousands of French e-retailers with the Up2pay e-Transactions solution that meets their needs and those of their customers.With Up2pay e-transactions, you benefit from all the advantages of a well-known french bank:- One of the most attractive electronic banking commission rates on the market from the start of your activity- Payment of cash receipts into your account on D+1- A single contact person to meet your needs- After-sales support included (email and telephone) based in France Discover our commitment-free offer here. New : Up2pay e-Transactions Prestashop module is 3D Secure V2 compliant, in accordance with DSP2 regulation.[1] Up2pay e-Transactions is an offer subject to general and pricing conditions, reserved for professionals registered in France, excluding Marketplaces. The Up2pay e-Transactions offer requires a Crédit Agricole account agreement and the signature of an e-commerce card payment acceptance contract including the Up2pay e-Transactions services option.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews.
module.additional_description: We offer a solution that will give you a 360 degree "voice of the customer" strategy which includes: multichannel collection, monitoring and moderation platform, statistics engine & verbatim analysis, syndication of opinions, and retrieval of opinions from third-party sources. 1. A quick and easy all-in-one solution. 2. From site reviews, product reviews, and business reviews everything in our soultion can be adapted to your needs including personalized opinion email requests, campaign deadlines, and how the widgets are displayed. 3. Google Partner - display stars in your search and PLA google ads campaigns thanks to our partnership with Google. 4. A trusted third party - Our feedback requests are make after the purchase on 100% of your buyers. 5. By turning customer opinions into a KPI, you are engaging with your teams in a positive way, engaging in better communication and optimizing your entire business. 6. Take advantage of the interconnection between our opinion platform and other Skeepers products and put your customer at the heart of your marketing strategy.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work:- Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: ndksteppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step"
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices. What's New with Amazon Pay? When shoppers check out with Amazon Pay and Affirm, they get more flexibility than ever (US only).
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

Drive conversion with Link, a one-click checkout experience your customers can complete in just 6 seconds—that’s 9x faster than non-Link customers. Simply turn on over 40 payment methods with no additional development required and dynamically display the most relevant payment methods based on your customers’ location and device. It’s a reliable and secure platform trusted by millions of ecommerce businesses around the world that protects your customers from data breaches, fraud, and security threats. Stay compliant with PSD2 SCA requirements in Europe with no additional development work.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.additional_description: Autopay S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software. Install the plugin, provide your clients with their favourite payment channels and develop your online sales. How do you benefit from installing the BluePayment plugin? Thanks to easy and straightforward integration with our Autopay payment gateway, you obtain the possibility of accepting online payments from the clients of your online store. The installation and configuration process is very simple. In only a few minutes time you can give your clients the possibility of paying for their purchases via their favorite channels. The funds paid by them will be credited directly to your account on a day + 1 basis. What will your clients gain? First of all, the possibility of safe and convenient online shopping. Autopay payment gateway allows you to use the most popular payment methods, including fast Pay by Link, BLIK 0, card payment or payment by instalments. The key advantage is 100% payment security, which we can guarantee as a national payment institution providing modern payment solutions based on stable and proven technology used by banks and a number of other institutions.

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

Boost your online sales by presenting your products on a one-to-one basis, live and via video. Shoppable Videos: convert any video or photo you have into a shoppable and interactive format so your users can shop with them directly.Triple the average time your customers spend with your e-commerce business and grow your sales.

module.additional_description: The daily task of writing product descriptions can be tedious and time-consuming. And we know that your time is precious. That's why we're providing you with an e-commerce co-pilot that will help you create the best possible, SEO-optimized descriptions in the shortest possible time. Our "E-commerce Copilot" module lets you use the power of GPT-4 artificial intelligence to generate your product and category descriptions, as well as the content of your CMS pages. Don't spend hours manually writing your product descriptions: team up with a qualified partner and save time every day! SAVE TIME EVERY DAY The module installs an e-commerce content writing wizard on your PrestaShop store, saving you time every day: choose the type of content you want to write (short, long or meta description of a product or category, CMS page content), ask the AI to generate it, proofread it, modify it if necessary, then save! In just a few clicks, you'll have a complete, SEO-optimized text with minimum effort. In the same way, you can ask GPT-4 to translate content into any of your store's languages.We've already drawn up prompts for you to send to GPT-4, so that you can start using the module as soon as it's installed, and save time in the process. However, if for any reason you'd like to write your own prompts, you can! A tab in the module configuration is dedicated to customizing prompts.Finally, there's no need to go outside the product creation forms to use AI: we've integrated the tool for generating and translating product descriptions directly within the forms. This allows you to enlist the help of your co-pilot directly during the product creation process! You can also call on your e-commerce assistant at any time, wherever you are in the back office of your PrestaShop store. The AI can be accessed directly via a menu section in your PrestaShop store. KEEP CONTROL OVER THE QUALITY OF YOUR CONTENT Artificial Intelligence is powerful, but it can't completely replace you. That's why we've made it a point of honor to let you control the content generated, ensuring that the text is consistent and perfectly reflects your vision and the style of your store. Once your approval has been obtained, the module automatically saves the new texts or translations.
